activities: Names, contact details, demographic information, and opinions of consumers and individuals collected via surveys and other research techniques, such as focus groups.  Information such as names, email addresses, telephone numbers, and demographic information may be transferred by clients to our firm for use in market research services we provide.
personaldata: Oranization, Client, Customer, On-Line, & Manually Processed Data
privacyprograms:
MRA (Marketing Research Association)
AAPOR (American Association of Public Opinion Researchers)
recoursemech: EMC Research will escalate complaints to our legal department who will consult with EMC Research management on an appropriate response or action to the complaint.  If this does not resolve the issue to the satisfaction of the complainant, EMC Research agrees to cooperate with Data Protection Authorities or their representatives in any investigation or resolution of complaints brought under Safe Harbor.
